mapper.select: select rt.*, to_char(rtdate, 'HH24"시" MI"분"') rttime, tname from runningtimetable rt, theater t where mid = #{mid} and rt.lid = #{lid} and t.tid = rt.tid and rtdate >= sysdate

select rt.*, to_char(rtdate, 'HH24:MI') rttime, m.mtitle, l.lname, t.tname from movie m, location l, runningtimetable rt, theater t where rt.lid = l.lid and rt.mid=m.mid and rt.tid = t.tid and rtdate = (select rtdate from runningtimetable where rtid = #{rtid})

select rt.*, to_char(rt.rtdate, 'hh24:mi') rttime, m.mtitle, m.mrunningtime, m.mgrade, t.tname from runningtimetable rt, movie m, theater t where rt.lid= #{lid} and to_char(rt.rtdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{date} and rt.mid=m.mid and t.tid=rt.tid order by rttime
select rt.rtid, count(b.bseat) seats from runningtimetable rt, booking b where rt.rtid = b.rtid and rt.lid= #{lid} and to_char(rt.rtdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') = #{date} group by rt.rtid order by rtid

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select rtid, r.lid, tid,mid,rtdate,timezone, l.lname from runningtimetable r, location l where r.lid = l.lid order by rtdate desc )a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select rt.*, to_char(rt.rtdate, 'hh24:mi') rttime, m.mtitle, m.mrunningtime, m.mgrade, t.tname, l.lname from runningtimetable rt, movie m, theater t, location l where rt.rtid= #{rtid} and rt.mid=m.mid and t.tid=rt.tid and rt.lid = l.lid
mapper.insert: insert into runningtimetable values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(rtid),0) + 1 FROM runningtimetable), #{lid}, #{tid}, #{mid}, to_date(#{rtdateString}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'),#{timezone})
